meanings.definition: A person who operates a printing press.
meanings.sent1: The pressman printed hundreds of flyers for the event.
meanings.sent2: The pressman fixed the printing press when it broke down.
meanings.sent3: The pressman accidentally printed the newspaper upside down!
meanings.sent4: The pressman's precision on the printing press was like a conductor leading an orchestra.
meanings.sent5: The pressman's job requires attention to detail and skill.

meanings.definition: A man who works in the press industry.
meanings.sent1: The pressman delivered newspapers to the local stores.
meanings.sent2: The pressman interviewed the CEO for the front-page story.
meanings.sent3: The pressman joked that he had 'pressing' matters to attend to.
meanings.sent4: The pressman in the industry was as essential as ink to a printer.
meanings.sent5: The pressman's knowledge of the press industry was vast and impressive.
